DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether identification of two different bacteria in urine culture of patients with indwelling catheter has a clinical impact - change in antibiotic, duration of antibiotic, days to clinical resolution and length of stay in hospital. The microbiology laboratory will randomized urine cultures with two bacteria from indwelling catheter to either reporting identity and susceptibility of the bacteria or reporting "mixed growth".
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Impact of Isolation of Two Different Bacteria in Urinary Cultures
DOC.criteria: Adults hospitalized with indwelling urinary catheter in growth of two bacteria in urine culture Positive blood cultures or no blood cultures taken
DOC.keyword: Urinary tract infection with two bacteria in culture
